en: Too many rules can hinder creativity.
Lack of confidence can hinder success.
We need to determine the cause of the problem.
The test will determine your English level.

tr: Yeni bir hayata başlamaya karar verdi.
en: She determined to start a new life.

tr: Toplantı için en uygun zamanı belirleyelim.
en: Let’s determine the best time for the meeting.
